data.title: Wikipedia
data.text:
House of BondioniCountryItalyFounded1600FounderGiovan Maria BondioniTitles

Prince of Niardo up to 1815

Earl of Niardo

Estate(s)Niardo

The House of Bondioni was a most important family for Niardo and Val Camonica. Bondioni family was also part of the Italian nobility.

The dynasty was founded by Giovan Maria Bondioni (1600â€“60), he was a condottiero from Niardo. In 1630 to fight the Landsknecht, Giovanni Maria Bondioni sat at the head of a citizen army to stop the mercenaries sent by Ferdinand II, Holy Roman Emperor.

Tradition says that the family has origins dating back to ancient Greece. The myth has it that it was Diomedes, son of Tydeus and Deipyle, to found the family, after his marriage to Aigialeia.
